ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 163
ygData.msgSnippet: I think tinkered pets would be just what we need to make the skill at least tolerable and unique..... All they have to do is put the scripting ....Cant have
ygData.messageBody:
I think tinkered pets would be just what we need to make the skill at least
tolerable and unique..... All they have to do is put the scripting ....Cant
have more than one pet at a time when trying to do a casted pet ....Although
I wonder what good is it that we make items that can be out done by
characters conjuring or Items that sound good ,but have limits imposed on
them that make them Lame ... for Example : Fireworks milli -second burst or
short duration of stalking probes.......If verant was so concerned about
unfair advantage he sure wasn't applying them to the monsters..... Rules like
No 2 pets don't seem to apply to monsters.. I still must wonder how they
get away with Evil Eyes charming ya and still having a pet.....Cloverleaf
...<fennin Ro server>
